entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
